documents.document: A "comma meeting"?! Not quite. A "comms meeting". #oops
Had a #comma meeting about a staff competition to name our new meeting rooms. Had to introduce the comms team to #boatymcboatface
Cats registered with the vet & chip numbers updated! Thanks @SPCAWgtn! #chip&snip
She's grounded today & only given her a wee bit of food to give her stomach a rest.
Tuesday morning! Cat's sick. Not a great start to to the day. Poor wee thing hasn't been right for a day or so.
How Drumpfâ€™s Rush to Enact an Immigration Ban Unleashed Global Chaos https://t.co/6CFpihudLT
@JoeyPBrenner aye, better hold off on that US road trip for a bit. ;)
The entire #TrumpBan story blows my mind. Launched on #HolocaustMemorialDay too.
Giving "power back to you, the people"? - Trump executive order: White House stands firm over travel ban https://t.co/5IBBL9OULf
Fun but tricky job as everyone wants to share their successes but no one likes being filmed or photographed.
Monday morning. Back to the office. Today I'm shooting & editing a short film clip for staff about one of our team's hard work. #comms
@c1aran that's why I've changed them. ;)
@MrJonesTalks it's awesome! Middle of summer now. Got my diving kit & all my other stuff. Life's good. ðŸ˜ŽHow's life in the capital?
My Sunday in a photo. #rewiring https://t.co/RpZxdqp64s
Need to go through the rest of my setup &check its all working. My regs need a service but I hope my BCD is ok. #FingersCrossed
Great to get my drysuit back again after 4 years. Stood in the sun waxing the zip & talcing the seals while looking out over the sea. :)))
Spent yesterday loaded with the cold unpacking our stuff.
OUR STUFF ARRIVED FROM THE UK!!!! YASSSSSSSS!!!! https://t.co/CDH4YfECsI
Up early & out to the gym. I'm sure there's a beautiful sunset out here, if I could open my eyes.
Drinking an 433 by @garage_project @ Westpac Stadium â€” https://t.co/vsMNMagTVV #photo
Accidentally at the launch of @Garage_Project 433! Delicious!! #craftbeer https://t.co/YAJD045Hj1
Cold & rainy in Wellington. A stout kinda day. #craftnotcrap https://t.co/AYJm7YyRuC

Best response on a #comms survey:
Q- How would you prefer to get info A- Written down & put inside a raspberry cupcake so we can enjoy it!
Prepare To Laugh At Some Of The Darkest Humor On The Internet https://t.co/UGIuzUExGY
Crazy storm last night. Calmed down a bit now. A good day to stay indoors.
Been offline for a bit but now returning to Twitter again. So, what did I miss?
How To Be Calm Under Pressure: 3 Secrets From A Bomb Disposal Expert https://t.co/lYn99miLrI via @bakadesuyo
@stevielucas Haha! Merry Christmas to you too
If you're looking for a job in the NZ health sector check out our vacancies page. #Newzealand #health #jobs https://t.co/B0hPFo6hmG
@EdinReporter hello!! Viz? I'll check it out. Slides would be great. NZ is great! How's Auld Reekie?
Take a peek inside the Wondrous #WellingtonAdvent Calendar https://t.co/oaEeqDhbx8 via @Wellington_NZ
@great_defector everyone is well. What they say about animals knowing is bollocks though. Ours didn't wake up!
@siobhh yeah, all good in Mornington. Hope your neck of the woods was the same. Scary stuff.
@shaun_running yes, thanks. Scary stuff but we're good thanks. :)
Well that's the first earthquake I've ever felt. Scary! #welcometonewzealand https://t.co/C6Wa3njZFw
Bottled @Jamiedlynch & I's Dunk Dog clone of @brewdog's Punk IPA. #craftbeer #homebrew Thanks @occasionalbrewr! https://t.co/KPbKFYVCQp
Morning! Today I'm harnessing the power of Georgia espresso. #cafiend https://t.co/RkJlFiNBMd

Great chance to join a really nice group of people.
Disclosure: I work there. ;) https://t.co/B0hPFonSLg
@PacificBeerExpo it's in the calendar already!
Next up: making infographics for our finance section.
Afternoon. Fully recovered from @PacificBeerExpo. Spent today throwing together a plain English guide for work #pedant #grammarnazi
@shaun_running will do. Pleasant dreams.
Afternoon all. Out &I about in Welly today. Buying some essentials; aftershave. #excitingtimesahead
New project for work: social branding for recruitment. Going to be adding LinkedIn to the list of #socialmedia I've used for work.
@PacificBeerExpo can't wait. And I've even got the Monday off to recover. ;)
Morning! Fire Friday!! Long weekend, first pay check & @PacificBeerExpo!!! :))) #craftbeer #excitingtimes
Stories of loss supported by the Waikato - https://t.co/LQtDes8g4K
Things you relearn about yourself: many of my pet hates revolve around fonts & font sizes. #comms
Morning! My new boss starts today. And I've got a new work mobile to break in.
@great_defector ALL THE PULSES!!!!!
@KB_Shampain yeah, gonna wait till they really drop in May.
Midweek (?) beer to celebrate my first NZ pay check. Another cracker from @LibertyBrewer. #craftbeer https://t.co/E7tQ3tKwnC
@FranSassy21 I find a great way to get a discount on goods is to do that & then slowly but loudly count them out when paying. #toptip
@FranSassy21 been so broke that the Salvation Army knocked on our door the other day & surrendered.
Not a full pay cycle but still the first income I've had since leaving Korea two months ago.
Morning! Got my first pay check today!!!! Woohooo!!!! #excitingtimes
Got texted my NZ income tax number. Thanks @NZInlandRevenue! Now I can get paid next week. :))) #excitingtimesahead
Kids! What time is it?! #NewZealand https://t.co/AvvGNJXlUc
First leg day in about 3 months. Couldn't walk down the stairs to the changing room. #hurting
@JoeyPBrenner @LukeCage can't wait to get stuck into it.
@trixylibrarian @piktochart great, thanks! Everything's good. Just need to get my first paycheck & I'll be sorted. Hope you're well. :)
Morning lads & lassies!! Any good tips for sites to make free infographics? Thanks! :) #comms #pr #socmed
Going to hammer my Netflix account tonight!!! Not being able to check out @LukeCage has been torture!!
You forget just how much of a modern necessity internet access is until you don't have it.
Got word that the man from @vodafoneNZ has arrived at the house to install our internet! #excitingtimes
Morning! Just did my intro at the big staff meeting. Been a while since I've stood up & spoken in front of so many adults.
Morning! Today's excitement: booking in to get internet installed in the flat tomorrow. #excitingtimes
I've a massive amount to learn about the business, all the services it provides & its clients/stakeholders first though. #learningcurve
So far ppl here are far more comfortable with the idea that they should celebrate their successes than those in some of my previous roles.
Also very interesting to hear what type of Comms support they want & where they think we could do better at promoting the business.
Second meeting of the day is an intro to one of the service areas which the business provides. Interesting stuff.
First meeting of the day. Gist: "We want to be on social media & generate content that people enjoy". What a start! #excitingTimes
Morning! First full week of work coming up & first Monday. #excitingTimes
Not having wifi yet makes following the #SCOLTU game even more stressful. #comeonscotland
Quick sharpener at @Garage_Project. For the purposes of science I'm trying Death From Above on keg & Cask. Cheers! https://t.co/bcYLk8ZIzE
I've not used Sharepoint before so I need to learn what it can do & how I do it. #web #comms
So, my first project of my new job is updating the intranet. Any #Comms or #web ppl recommend good intro to Sharepoint sites?
Morning! Weather update: it's freezing!!
@siobhh thanks!
To the natives the after work pint was a sacred animal... @TuataraBrew https://t.co/W5C8v8fLJF
Morning! Suited and booted for my first day at my new job. Very excited. And up faaar to early. :) #excitingtimes
@c1aran that could have been anyone's ass! ;)
@ASBBank thanks! I will do. :)
@TuataraBrew shame about the lack of tunes that night. But the beer will more than make up for it. ;)
Today's major achievement: opened a bank account! Went with @ASBBank. Their staff were great! #excitingtimesahead
@TuataraBrew anything musical on tomorrow evening? My first day of my new job so want to come over for my first after work pint. :)
@BeerKel @ForkandBrewer nice! Especially interested in the saison. Haven't seen many in Welly so far.
.@TheSoundNZ is rapidly becoming part of my daily routine. As good music should.
Mornin'! Last nights krazy fog has lifted & today looks like it could be another good one. #weatherchat
@MrJonesTalks @hackneycouncil good but The Dear Leader does it best. https://t.co/UwojjQ15Tc
Well, no looks like visa today then. :(
Wellington is awesome but I feel I'm in limbo until these things happen. So today I'm constantly refreshing my Gmail.
Until I get my visa confirmed I can't start my job, get internet in the apartment or get a NZ bank account.
I've been told to expect a decision on my visa today or at the latest tomorrow. Can't stress how impatient I am for this.
Quick coffee stop now. Then off to investigate the state of gentlemen work fashions. Not a bad place for a cuppa. https://t.co/TmsZJPJwzn
On my way I dropped into @lesmills on Taranaki St. Cracking facilities. Definitely signing up with them ASAP.
Afternoon! Today's major achievement so far: join @wcl_library. Also downloaded their app which is pretty neat too.
From yesterday's #zwanzeday - Drinking a Kriek 100% Lambic @ Garage Project Taproom - https://t.co/g9qEebvrpV #photo
From yesterday's #zwanzeday - Drinking a Single Barrel 1-Year Lambic @ Garage Project Taproom - https://t.co/3EbItPIG1R #photo
#ZwanzeDay was ace! My first time attending the event & first time at @Garage_Project's tap room. Will definitely bâ€¦ https://t.co/fhywkHN1Wz
